meanings.sent1: The spinnings of the carousel made me dizzy.
meanings.sent2: She watched the spinnings of the top with fascination.
meanings.sent3: The spinnings of the fan created a funny breeze in the room.
meanings.sent4: The spinnings of the Earth around the sun never cease.
meanings.sent5: The spinnings of the ballerina were mesmerizing to the audience.

meanings.definition: Material that has been spun or twisted into a thread or yarn.
meanings.sent1: The spinnings of the spider created a delicate web.
meanings.sent2: She knitted a scarf using the soft spinnings of wool.
meanings.sent3: The spinnings of the cotton were fluffy and light.
meanings.sent4: The spinnings of the silk reflected the light beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The spinnings of the yarn were colorful and vibrant.

meanings.definition: A feeling of dizziness or disorientation.
meanings.sent1: His spinnings after the roller coaster ride were intense.
meanings.sent2: She experienced spinnings after spinning around too quickly.
meanings.sent3: The spinnings from the optical illusion were amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The spinnings of the room made her feel like she was in a funhouse.
meanings.sent5: The spinnings from the merry-go-round left her giggling with joy.
